resources.string: Please provide your WiFi credentials from MySelfnet
Note: If you have no screen lock, Android refuses to store the security settings!
This small helper app creates a Wifi connection entry for the Selfnet WiFi network. It configures the correct SSL CA and subject name match, making it a little more secure than a hand-created entry.
If you face any problems connecting to the WiFi please check whether you type in the WiFi password, not that one for MySelfnet, correctly.\nIf this doesn\'t help contact support@selfnet.de.
